allow: Bash(# Test with a properly formatted UUID to make sure workflow is still working curl --request POST \\ --url https://lukelu.zeabur.app/webhook/api/chat \\ --header ''Content-Type: application/json'' \\ --data ''{""user_id"":""00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"",""message"":""列出所有聯絡人""}'' \\ --max-time 30)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add security improvements, privacy policy, and UI enhancements

- Remove hardcoded API keys, use Config.xcconfig
- Add privacy policy page \(in-app + GitHub Pages\)
- Add delete account functionality
- Improve email validation \(RFC 5322\)
- Add password complexity requirements
- Add Dark Mode support for auth views
- Add custom ReMeetLogo component
- Add DesignSystem with adaptive colors

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
